demandSensitivity: The demand shows moderately elastic (moderately sensitive) behavior. As price increases from ₹40.00 to ₹50.00 (25.0% change), demand increases by 25.0%. This indicates that customers are relatively stable to price changes.
explanation:
The optimal price point of ₹50 maximizes profit for your ride-hailing platform.

At this price:
• Expected demand: 100 units
• Expected profit: ₹3,000
• Expected revenue: ₹5,000

This recommendation considers both the per-unit margin and overall demand volume to maximize profitability.
